contest-event.event-date:
March 1, 1958 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Broxburn Public. Best section 3 band - Kinneil Colliery. Best section 4 band - tie between Broxburn Catholic and Winchburgh Public. Best hymn tune - Hawick. Deportment - 1st Fife and Forfar T.A., 2nd 7th Argylls.
22 bands competed.
Oct. 16, 2011, 8:12 p.m. May 7, 2014, 11:22 a.m.
1 City of Edinburgh Band John Hoggans
2 Bellshill & District Concert Brass Dugald MacBrayne
3 Hawick Saxhorn Band James Amos
4 Unison Kinneil Band John Kirkwood
5 Bonnybridge & District Gregor Grant
Unknown Result Broxburn Public Band Harry Holwill
Unknown Result Broxburn Silver T. Connolly
Unknown Result Fife and Forfar Yeomanry Unknown
Unknown Result Winchburgh Public Richard Pritchard
Withdrawn Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Unknown
Withdrawn Newmains Unknown
